maintainPage.title: maintainWmsWorkerRulePage
maintainPage.datasource: SELECT table.id, user.code, table.code, table.synonymName, table.type, table.numRows, table.description FROM ItmsTable table LEFT JOIN table.user user LEFT JOIN table.user.location location LEFT JOIN table.user.location.warehouseArea warehouseArea LEFT JOIN table.user.location.warehouseArea.warehouse warehouse WHERE 1=1 AND table.status = 'ENABLED' and table.synonymName is not null AND warehouseArea.warehouse = #{SESSION_WAREHOUSE} AND user.location.warehouseArea.id = {wk.location.warehouseArea.id} and not exists(select 1 from ItmsAuthority mce where 1=1 and mce.worker.id = {worker.id} and mce.sender = 'delete' and mce.table.code = table.code and mce.table.user.code = user.code) ORDER BY table.id DESC
